    \begin{verbatim}
function table = Calculate_Divided_Differences(x, y)
    n = length(y);
    table = zeros(n, n+1); % initialize matrix for storing values
    table(:, 1) = x(:); % Set Column 1 as the x values
    table(:, 2) = y(:); % Set Column 2 as the y values

    for j = 3:n+1 % Alter the loop accordingly to start at column 3
        for i = j-1:n
         % f(xn, xn-1) =  (yn - yn-1)    /      (xn-1 - xn)
            table(i,j) = ((table(i,j-1) - table(i-1,j-1))) / ((x(i) - x(i-j+2)));
        end
    end
end
\end{verbatim}
